price: 7 Nul prophète n’est venu à elles sans qu’elles ne le tournent en dérision.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
